title: fix(di): Standardize tool registration signature across all modules (Phase 4)
body:
This PR fixes the Dependency Injection implementation by enforcing a consistent `register_tools(mcp, client)` signature across ALL tool modules.

**Key Changes:**
1.  **Removed fragile inspection logic** in `tools/__init__.py`. Now it simply calls `module.register_tools(mcp, client)`.
2.  **Updated all 16 tool modules** to accept the `client` parameter (even if they don't use it yet).
3.  **Ensured PROD stability**: This eliminates runtime errors caused by mismatched function signatures.

**Note:** This replaces the previous partial migration approach with a global update.
head: fix/di-global-update
